description: Manages a SDRS protected instance resource within FlexibleEngine.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

ClusterId.description: Specifies the ID of a storage pool. Changing this creates a new instance.

DeleteTargetEip.description: Specifies whether to delete the EIP of the target server. The default value is false. Changing this creates a new instance.

DeleteTargetServer.description: Specifies whether to delete the target server. The default value is false.. Changing this creates a new instance.

Description.description: The description of a protected instance. Changing this creates a new instance.

GroupId.description: Specifies the ID of the protection group where a protected instance is added. Changing this creates a new instance.

Name.description: The name of a protected instance.

PrimaryIpAddress.description: Specifies the IP address of the primary NIC on the target server. Changing this creates a new instance.

PrimarySubnetId.description: Specifies the subnet ID of the primary NIC on the target server. Changing this creates a new instance.

ServerId.description: Specifies the ID of the source server. Changing this creates a new instance.
